message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it.  However,  $11,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we settle on $10,500? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
